title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate that spermatozoa contain no mitochondria or that all mitochondria in an organism are derived from the ovum.
The response indicates that spermatozoa contain no mitochondria and that all mitochondria in an organism are derived from the ovum.
